object.name: editMessageMedia
object.description: Use this method to edit animation, audio, document, photo, or video messages. If a message is part of a message album, then it can be edited only to an audio for audio albums, only to a document for document albums and to a photo or a video otherwise. When an inline message is edited, a new file can't be uploaded; use a previously uploaded file via its file_id or specify a URL. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited Message is returned, otherwise True is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to edit animation, audio, document, photo, or video messages. If a message is part of a message album, then it can be edited only to an audio for audio albums, only to a document for document albums and to a photo or a video otherwise. When an inline message is edited, a new file can't be uploaded; use a previously uploaded file via its file_id or specify a URL. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited Message is returned, otherwise True is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to edit animation, audio, document, photo, or video messages. If a message is part of a message album, then it can be edited only to an audio for audio albums, only to a document for document albums and to a photo or a video otherwise. When an inline message is edited, a new file can't be uploaded; use a previously uploaded file via its file_id or specify a URL. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` is returned, otherwise :code:`True` is returned.

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.name: message_id

annotations.description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.html_description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.rst_description: Required if *chat_id* and *message_id* are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.name: inline_message_id

annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object for a new media content of the message
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for a new media content of the message

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for a new inline keyboard.
